11.eng-name: The Book of the Commencement of the Prayer

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Hudhaifah that:The Prophet (ﷺ) recited Surat Al-Baqarah, Al 'Imran and An-Nisa' in one rak'ah, and he did not reach any verse that spoke of mercy but he asked Allah for it, nor any verse that spoke of punishment but he asked Allah for protection therefrom

chapter.ara-name: باب مَسْأَلَةِ الْقَارِئِ إِذَا مَرَّ بِآيَةِ رَحْمَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: Reciter asking Allah when he reaches a verse mentioning mercy
